sense.def:
To declare that something is the case
pomeni odločno in pretehtano nekaj izjaviti.

seg.quote: They were heard to declare that they would never steal again.

sense.def:
To declare an attitude or intention
ali
to declare oneself as having this attitude or intention
pomeni javno razodeti, da imamo neko mnenje ali namen.

seg.quote: He declared his intention to fight.
Mr Bell has declared his support.
He declared himself strongly in favour of the project.

sense.def:
To declare something
pomeni javno in uradno nekaj izjaviti.

seg.quote: The French declared war on England.
At his trial he was declared innocent.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
declares
blago, ki ga je kupil v tujini, ali denar, ki ga je tam zaslužil, o njem pove carinskemu uslužbencu, da mu odmerijo plačilo carine.
